short_summary: Invitation to Qualify - Medical Evacuation Services
description: Invitation to Qualify - Medical Evacuation Services. This is a request for Information about the Medical Evacuation Services provided by the Department of National Defence and the Canadian Armed Forces. The main objective of this invitation to qualify is to identify the suppliers that are qualified to provide Medical Evacuation Services.

full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify - Medical Evacuation Services

#### Tender Number
PW-23-01021344

#### Publication Date
January 13, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
February 22, 2023, at 14:00 (ET)

#### Government Organization
Department of National Defence

#### Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) and Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) require services for medical evacuation of personnel due to illness or injury. Contracted support is needed on an as-and-when-required basis to move patients from local airports or medical facilities to a medical facility that can provide the requisite level of medical care.

#### Objective of Phase 1
The objective of Phase 1 is to qualify suppliers who will be invited to participate in Phase 2 (Engagement) and Phase 3 (Request for Proposal) of the Medical Evacuation Services solicitation. Suppliers must demonstrate their ability to deliver global medical evacuation services through a formal evaluation.

#### Key Procurement Information
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive/Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: World

#### Important Dates
* Phase 1 – Invitation to Qualify: Closed on February 22, 2023.
* Phase 2 and 3: Dates will be announced in due course.

#### Contact Information
For any questions or inquiries, please contact:
Jean-Michel Laroche
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Dr.
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
Telephone: (613) 294-5508
Email: [jean-michel.laroche@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jean-michel.laroche@forces.gc.ca)

#### Document Attachments
* ITQ – Questions and Answers 1 to 5 (English)
* ITQ – Questions and Answers 6 to 8 (English)
* Medical Evacuation Services Invitation to Qualify (English)
* ISQ – Questions et réponses 1 à 5 (French)
* ISQ – Questions et réponses 6 à 8 (French)
* Medical Evacuation Services Invitation to Qualify (French)

Note: The text is rewritten for clarity, without omitting essential details. The formatting is reorganized to provide a better visual structure, and a clear timeline is presented. The language is polished to enhance readability and meet professional standards
